reviewText: Once again the Hui brothers (Michael, Samuel and Ricky) create mayhem, this time in the world of television. After all this time working together, each of the brothers is firmly established in a particular role: Michael is  the master of dead-pan comedy, Samuel is the charmer and Ricky is the  bumbling assistant to Michael. This probably ranks as one of their funniest  films and deserves an international audience. To pigeon-hole their films is  impossible as they seem to mix Python with the Marx brothers and many  others. If you can though, get hold of the Dvd print which is obviously  superior.
